duties_responsibilities.duty: Gather, trace, translate, and manage complex requirements, business rules, and data from varied stakeholders.
Map business processes, user stories, and functional and non-functional requirements.
Ensure accuracy and completeness of requirements, documentation, and deliverables.
Utilize agile methodology and growth mindset.
Write technical documentation and communicate effectively.
Think critically and analytically to understand complex business and technical requirements.
Break down problems, identify patterns, and derive insights from data.
